hey Frank,
 
What are you trying to say I'm a frady cat 
 
Bruce
Bruce Hal=
liday 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: warrior18eii@...: Wed, =
16 Jan 2008 05:45:55 -0800Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: PROTECTION RITUAL FILE=
 POSTED






I may draw some flack from this post but I feel this is a ver=
y important subject. What exactly are you doing when you use a ritual or pr=
ayer for protection? You are placing limitations on the session. What is th=
e point of doing research in ITC if you are not willing to deal with all as=
pects of it? The enemy is not some nasty entity out there that wants to cus=
s and threaten you, it is your fear. All of us who have been doing this for=
 any length of time come across, as Sumption calls them "paper tigers". The=
y bark, bark, bark but have no real bite! Unchecked fear causes the most da=
mage both psychologically and physically. This fear (the lack of control of=
 it) is also the reason why people make up these rituals.Regards,Frank R.
-=
---- Original Message ----From: Robin Searcy Henson <MudPuddleFarm@...>=
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comSent: Tuesday, January 15, 2008 5:29:04 PMSubjec=
t: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: PROTECTION RITUAL FILE POSTED



Oookay, that is scary=
.  Glad to hear all is well now.
 
Robin

008 3:26 PM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: PROTECTION RITUAL FILE POSTED


He s=
aid threatening things. He threw a shelf off my wall about 5feet...showed u=
p as shadows in the hallway...talking atnight....oppressive tight feeling i=
n my chest if he was active...high emfreadings when he was active..> Carol,=
 I guess my confusion is over how a ritual works to stop an entity> intent =
on causing harm. I'm someone who prays and meditates often, but I> wonder i=
f bad spirits are capable of disregarding the boundaries we set> for them. =
I do know that when I told my threatening EVPer to go back> outside it work=
ed; in fact, I haven't been able to record ANY EVP in my> house since then.=
 I've never gotten the cursing so many people describe.> Besides having a b=
ad mouth, did the Waverly entity do other things?>> Robin>>> ----- Original=

ogroups .com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com>> Sent: Tuesday, January 15, 2=

bin...> I never use protection.. .and have had a problem with a spirit that=
 came> home with us from Waverly. He's gone now, with the help of a great> =
individual. I have evp's of this entity saying horrible things. I think> I =
may start using protection now...>> Carol B.>> > As someone who has never u=
sed a protection ritual (even though I> consider> > myself a very spiritual=
 person), I'm not sure I understand what the> ritual> > is intended to prot=
ect the person invoking it from. I'm not being a> smart> > ass; I'm simply =
trying to learn. Can we be hurt physically or> psychically> > by certain sp=
irits, or can our experimentation open a dark portal> that's> > not meant t=
o be opened? My instinct has always been that if I don't> > acknowledge evi=
l it can have no power over me, but perhaps that's> > ignorant. I once invi=
ted spirits into my house from outside and> > immediately recorded a negati=
ve EVP while heating a cup of coffee in> the> > microwave. I was too ecstat=
ic to be frightened by the message, but> since> > then I've wondered what k=
ind of spirit would want to say such a thing> to> > me and if I should be m=
ore cautious in the future. I would love some> > feedback on this recording=
.> >> > Robin> >> >> >> > ----- Original Message -----> > From: Frank> Sump=
tion<mailto:franks-boxes@ hotmail.com<mailto:franks- boxes%40hotmail. com>>=

 thoughtform to fulfill that expectation.> >> > Frank-S> >> > --- In> EVP-I=
